title: Lit by the fading afternoon sunlight, Victoria Memorial achieves a rosy texture, which accentuates its...

attachments.displayName:
Lit by the fading afternoon sunlight, Victoria Memorial achieves a rosy texture, which accentuates its incomparable beauty.

Victoria Memorial is one of my favourite places in Kolkata, and it has reserved its well-deserved place again and again inside my frames. But still, something is so magical about this glorious building, and makes me willing to capture its pure, serenely white beauty yet again! Truly a marvel of engineering and architecture, this glorious site continues to win hearts.

Simply notice its light, reddish-white complexion. Man's art and nature's beauty thus combines, and blends together to form this magical moment. Long live the architects who designed it!

object.content:
Lit by the fading afternoon sunlight, Victoria Memorial achieves a rosy texture, which accentuates its incomparable beauty.

Victoria Memorial is one of my favourite places in Kolkata, and it has reserved its well-deserved place again and again inside my frames. But still, something is so magical about this glorious building, and makes me willing to capture its pure, serenely white beauty yet again! Truly a marvel of engineering and architecture, this glorious site continues to win hearts. 

Simply notice its light, reddish-white complexion. Man's art and nature's beauty thus combines, and blends together to form this magical moment. Long live the architects who designed it!
